DOC.brief_summary: Intervention study malnourish adult ass whether nutritional supplement give 8 week addition subject 's usual diet improves body weight , body composition , biochemical immune parameter .

DOC.detailed_description: Criteria include study include : BMI ( Body Mass Index ) 19 Free cancer , HIV/AIDS , bulimia/anorexia malabsorption disorder Description : We study whether add nutritional shake help participant gain weight improve health immunity . This study last 8 week total 7 visit .
